item.strainsofascension.clock5.lore3: and helps him avoid early signs of the Strains

item.strainsofascension.poison_talisman4: A Talisman crafted by ancient Alchemists. Legends says it can be
used to protect from the Strains of the Abyss if carried on an
adventures Body. There is a Warning at the bottom: DRINK NOT!
item.strainsofascension.poison_talisman5: A Poison Talisman said to be brewed by Trulim the Master
Alchemists of the Whites. Little is known about him or his
Potions except that there are very few known to exist anymore.

but it looks similar to the Poison Talisman. Maybe there is a
connection? The label says: WITHER TALISMAN

the Whites. Extremly rare. A text on the side
says: 5 STAR WITHER REPELLANT. HANDLE WITH CARE! ~TRULIM

item.strainsofascension.shield.name: §6 Shield of the Whites
item.strainsofascension.shield.lore1: A legendary Shield crafted in a long forgotten World. It is said to
item.strainsofascension.shield.lore2: look like a Moon in Hell. As you pick it up, you feel Energy rushing
item.strainsofascension.shield.lore3: through your Body. It pulls you down - down in to the abyss...
